content: The decrease in operating expenses was primarily due to the change in share-based compensation expenses, which decreased to a positive RMB325.2 million in the first quarter of 2022 from RMB877.5 million in the same period of 2021 consisting of: first, share-based compensation expenses of positive RMB41.9 million recognized in selling expenses; two share-based compensation expenses of positive RMB230.1 million recognized in general and administrative expenses; and three, share-based compensation expenses of positive RMB53.2 million recognized in research and development expenses.
